description: TCPKeepalive define the TCP Keepalive configuration.

idleTime.description: The duration a connection needs to be idle before keep-alive probes start being sent. The duration format is Defaults to `7200s`.

interval.description: The duration between keep-alive probes. Defaults to `75s`.

probes.description: The total number of unacknowledged probes to send before deciding the connection is dead. Defaults to 9.
